meanings.definition: A unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a gram.
meanings.sent1: She measured the medicine in milligrams to ensure the correct dosage.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a medication that needed to be taken in milligrams.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added a million milligrams of salt to the soup!
meanings.sent4: Her love for chocolate was so strong, she could feel it in every milligram of her being.
meanings.sent5: The tiny ant could carry only a few milligrams of food back to its nest.
